    "# Classification probability plots"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "caee81db",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "Create line chart visualizations displaying the classification probabilities of a single classifier."
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 1,
   "id": "d86bb04c",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "from simba.plotting.probability_plot_creator_mp import TresholdPlotCreatorMultiprocess"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 2,
   "id": "20185f62",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "#DEFINITIONS\n",
    "\n",
    "CONFIG_PATH = '/Users/simon/Desktop/envs/troubleshooting/two_black_animals_14bp/project_folder/project_config.ini'\n",
    "FRAME_SETTING = False\n",
    "VIDEO_SETTING = True\n",
    "LAST_FRAME_SETTING = True\n",
    "CLASSIFIER_NAME = 'Attack'\n",
    "CORES = 5\n",
    "STYLE_ATTRIBUTES = {'width': 640, \n",
    "                    'height': 480, \n",
    "                    'font size': 10, \n",
    "                    'line width': 3, \n",
    "                    'color': 'blue', \n",
    "                    'circle size': 20, \n",
    "                    'y_max': 'auto'}"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 4,
   "id": "90615e9f",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "name": "stdout",
     "output_type": "stream",
     "text": [
      "Processing 1 video(s)...\n",
      "SIMBA COMPLETE: Final distance plot saved at /Users/simon/Desktop/envs/troubleshooting/two_black_animals_14bp/project_folder/frames/output/probability_plots/Together_1_Attack_final_image.png (elapsed time: 0.1092s) \tcomplete\n",
      "Creating probability images, multiprocessing (determined chunksize: 1, cores: 5)...\n",
      "Image 348/1738, Video 1/1...\n",
      "Image 696/1738, Video 1/1...\n",
      "Image 1044/1738, Video 1/1...\n",
      "Image 1392/1738, Video 1/1...\n",
      "Image 1740/1738, Video 1/1...\n",
      "Joining Together_1 multiprocessed video...\n",
      "SIMBA COMPLETE: Video concatenated (elapsed time: 2.6887s) \tcomplete\n",
      "Probability video Together_1 complete (elapsed time: 28.6517s) ...\n",
      "SIMBA COMPLETE: Probability visualizations for 1 videos created in project_folder/frames/output/gantt_plots directory (elapsed time: 28.6806s) \tcomplete\n"
     ]
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "plotter = TresholdPlotCreatorMultiprocess(config_path=CONFIG_PATH,\n",
    "                                          frame_setting=FRAME_SETTING,\n",
    "                                          video_setting=VIDEO_SETTING,\n",
    "                                          last_frame=LAST_FRAME_SETTING,\n",
    "                                          clf_name=CLASSIFIER_NAME,\n",
    "                                          cores=5,\n",
    "                                          files_found=['/Users/simon/Desktop/envs/troubleshooting/two_black_animals_14bp/project_folder/csv/machine_results/Together_1.csv'],\n",
    "                                          style_attr=STYLE_ATTRIBUTES)\n",
    "plotter.run()"
   ]
